Texts.Chs:
蹦蹦跳跳的太空探险家。

食性：素食性

^orange;天赋^reset;：
^green;+18%^reset Speed, ^green;+20%^reset Jump, ^green;-35%^reset Fall Damage.
^green;+30%^reset Ice Resist, ^green;+20%^reset Cosmic Resist.
Immune: Slime Stick, Jungle Tiles, Mud

^orange;环境^reset;：
On Garden, Forest, Tundra and Snow biomes, gain ^green;+10%^reset Health and Energy
Gain additional vitality and protection in jungles

^orange;武器^reset;：
Boomerang/Chakram: ^green;+10%^reset Crit Chance, ^green;+15%^reset Crit Damage
Fist Weapons: ^green;+15%^reset Protection and ^green;+25%^reset Knockback Resist

^red;弱点^reset;：
^red;-20%^reset Health, ^red;-10%^reset Energy
^red;-20%^reset Fire Resist
Texts.Eng:
Hoppy space explorers. 

Diet: Herbivore

^orange;Perks^reset;:
  +^green;18^reset;% Speed, +^green;20^reset;% Jump, Fall Damage x^green;0.65^reset;.
  Resist:+^green;30^reset;% Ice, +^green;20^reset;% Cosmic.
  Immune: Slime Stick, Jungle Tiles, Mud
 
^orange;Environment^reset;:
  Garden, Forest, Tundra and Snow biomes:
    Health & Energy x^green;1.1^reset;
  Jungles:
    Health x^green;1.1^reset;, Energy x^green;1.2^reset;
 
^orange;Weapons^reset;:
  Boomerang/Chakram: +^green;10^reset;% Crit Chance, +^green;15^reset;% Crit Damage
  Fist Weapons: Defense x^green;1.15^reset; and +^green;25^reset;% Knockback Resist
 
^red;Weaknesses^reset;:
  Health x^red;0.8^reset;, Energy x^red;0.9^reset; 
  Resist: -^red;20^reset;% Fire
